EmailTemplate.name: 2020_Greenhouse_IMUs_Ongoing-Lead-Dark_Nurture.Email 3: Until we speak again
EmailTemplate.subject: Until we speak again
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi {{lead.First Name:default=there}},
We’ve tried to reach you a few different times and unfortunately couldn’t connect.
This will be our last communication attempt for the time-being. We hope you’ve found the right product to meet your company’s needs.
Please reach out to us if there’s anything we can do to help.
Best,
The HGuide Support Team
